stories.original_headline: This spider’s “pearl necklace” was living parasites
stories.original_summary: What looked like a pearl necklace on a tiny spider turned out to be parasitic mite larvae. Scientists identified the mites as a new species, marking the first record of its family in Brazil. The larvae attach to juvenile spiders and feed on lymph through a weak spot in the spider’s body. The discove
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Tiny Imps on Spider, Not Pearls!
stories.fantasy_story: In a distant jungle realm, diligent Alchemists observed a small spider with what seemed to be a shimmering pearl necklace. Closer inspection revealed these were actually tiny, newly discovered parasitic imps! These magical mites attach to young spiders, slowly siphoning their life essence.

stories.original_headline: A sudden signal flare reveals the hidden partner behind fast radio bursts
stories.original_summary: A repeating fast radio burst has just given up one of its biggest secrets. Long-term observations revealed a rare signal flare caused by plasma likely ejected from a nearby companion star. This shows the burst source isn’t alone, but part of a binary system. The finding strengthens the case that mag
stories.fantasy_headline: Mysterious Sky Bursts Reveal a Hidden Celestial Twin!
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards observing the celestial sphere have long studied mysterious, repeating magical bursts. Recently, a sudden flare of ethereal energy was seen, revealing a hidden companion star! This means the powerful sky bursts come from two linked magical sources, not just one. It's a grand revelation about the heavens!

stories.original_summary: The Android ecosystem is all about choice. While iPhone owners have a smaller pool of new devices to pick from when it’s time to upgrade, there’s a wider range of choices on Android. Some Android phones even fold in half! Imagine. On the flip side, all that choice can make for some hard decisions. H
stories.fantasy_headline: Merchants Offer Many Enchanted Scrying Mirrors!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Market now boasts a vast selection of enchanted scrying mirrors for all. Unlike the simpler Elf-crafted mirrors, human guilds offer a wider array of magical artifacts. Some even fold in half with a flick of the wrist! This abundance of choice can make picking your next communication charm quite difficult.
